summary: With his mauve taxi, the old philosopher Dr. Seamus Scully (Fred Astaire) runs around the small green roads of the south of Ireland, becoming confident of his patients, while trying to help them find their way.
cast: Charlotte Rampling|Philippe Noiret|Peter Ustinov|Fred Astaire|Edward Albert|Agostina Belli|Jack Watson|Mairin D. O'Sullivan|David Kelly|Niall Buggy|May Cluskey|Loan Do Huu|Brendon Doyle|Michael Duffy|Derek Lord|John Molloy|Martin Dempsey|Eamon Morrissey
title: Un taxi malva
